Posts.Content: Denise0236 wrote: Well I'm here cause of my mother, I went with her today to see a specialist, who thinks that there is a 20% chance that she may have breast cancer due to the mammogram she had done 2 weeks ago..my mom goes once a year and get mammograms done, this year the Dr.  see  some cells that they are concerned about,  so next week she will be getting a biopsy done, the only good news is that the Dr. Said that if its cancer that its very early and that everything should be okay, my mom is very scared and doesn't know what to expect, and I'm very scared for her as well I love her dearly and I don't won't her going through pain...what happens after biopsy if it turns out that its cancer??  any advice is appriciated.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Wait for my mother to get her biopsy done Denise0236 mjm1
